Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value and functionality. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your daily experience. Given its unique features and the quality craftsmanship involved, we believe it's worth more than $80 to you. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $95. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need further information, please let me know. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
